txt.en: 'I learned the ways of the forest from our kin in the northern reaches of Mirkwood, and that place holds little fear for me. What the Enemy has wrought in the southern reaches of the forest fills me rather with anger, and with sadness for the life that once sheltered there.\n\n'I have planned a route through the forest that will permit us to bring Mazog almost to the very gates of Dol Guldur without being seen.'
